fetch_root.sql_query: SELECT top(10) user_site_name, count(*) as user_content_count FROM el_content left join el_user on el_user.user_id = el_content.user_id where el_content.content_status = 'active' GROUP BY user_site_name order by user_content_count desc
fetch_root.list_item: • $_db user_site_name; ($_db user_content_count;)
